jetpack-related-posts.title: Where To Stay
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Tropix Although secluded, Tropix is within 10 minutes walking distance of Sosua central. All rooms come equipped with a refrigerator, free WiFi, and ceiling fans (most have the option of air conditioning). The hotel offers breakfast served poolside and a small communal kitchen is also available to guests who may wish to prepare…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Paradise Island
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you’re looking for something special, look no further. This all day trip includes 3 meals, private transportation to Paradise Island (known locally as Cayo Arena), and guided snorkeling around one of the Dominican Republic’s most beautiful reefs. The day starts early at 7.30, where we meet and begin our journey to…
